code: import{Chart as ChartJS,ArcElement,Tooltip,Legend,CategoryScale,Title,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement}from"chart.js";import{Line}from"react-chartjs-2";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(ArcElement,Tooltip,Legend,CategoryScale,Title,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement);var CoinChart=function CoinChart(_ref){var coinHistory=_ref.coinHistory;var prices=[];var dates=[];for(var i=0;i<coinHistory.length;i++){dates.push(new Date(coinHistory[i][0]).toLocaleTimeString());prices.push(coinHistory[i][1]);}var data={labels:dates,datasets:[{label:"Prices in INR",data:prices,borderColor:"#ee8484"}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chart__container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Bitcoin Price Chart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"last__updated",children:["Last updated ",dates[0]]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chart-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{options:{responsive:true,maintainAspectRatio:false},data:data})})]});};export default CoinChart;
